definition: having a tail or taillike appendage, amphibians that resemble lizards
details:
adjective
- having a tail or taillike appendage
= synonyms: caudated
- tapering gradually into a long taillike tip, usually referring to leaves
= example: tapering gradually into a long taillike tip, usually referring to leaves
noun
- amphibians that resemble lizards
= synonyms: urodele
- a tail-shaped basal ganglion located in a lateral ventricle of the brain
= synonyms: caudate nucleus
